Bibliographic References: PP, no. 120, pi. 22a; PPSupp, no. 164; PhV2, p. 46, no. 64 (with bibliography to date); VIE i, p. 33, pi. 10 a and d.
Imagery Description: (a) Dionysos with thyrsus and beadNon Sepcifiedwreath and phlyax playing the flute, (b) Air + Br, both with sticks.
Additional Notes: The reverse is in very bad condition.
